definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: I struggled for a few days trying to come up with a good color palette for Overwatch .
sentences.chinese: 我努力的试图找出一个看守好调色板了几天。

sentences.english: The palette displays a set of tools for creating objects in the diagram.
sentences.chinese: 该调色板显示了一组工具，用于在图中创建对象。

sentences.english: In this room you can also find Aleksandr’s easel and palettes.
sentences.chinese: 在这个房间你也可以发现亚历山大的画架和调色板。

sentences.english: 16-bit file support and palettes were added to this version as well.
sentences.chinese: 这一版本还加入了16位图支持和调色板。

sentences.english: It’s a bit like having a palette of colors to dip your paintbrush in.
sentences.chinese: 这就像用画笔蘸着调色板里的颜料一样。

sentences.english: Various dry, muddy smears on the palette confirmed this statement.
sentences.chinese: 调色板上乱七八糟的污痕证实了这句话。

sentences.english: Use a palette with deep wells for mixing colour, with lots of water.
sentences.chinese: 使用带有混合调色板颜色深水井与大量的水。

sentences.english: Zip- Position chart and palette source code zip, Visual.
Add another import by dragging it from the palette into the assembly.
sentences.chinese: 请从调色板中通过拖动向程序集添加另一个导入。

sentences.english: The options palatte lets you choose the size or color of each tool.
sentences.chinese: 可选的调色板允许您选择每个工具的大小和颜色。

sentences.english: Starry, starry night, paint your palette blue and gray.
sentences.chinese: 星夜下调色板上只有蓝与灰。

sentences.english: If you need help building color palettes, check out the free tools below.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要帮助建立调色板，看看以下三个免费工具。

sentences.english: The color is automatically changed in the vector image when you change it in the colors palette.
sentences.chinese: 在矢量图形中的颜色会随着调色板的改变而改变。

sentences.english: In his arms, he carried a palette and paintbrushes.
sentences.chinese: 他手中拿着一个调色板和一支画笔。

sentences.english: Whether to install a private colormap when running in 8-bit mode on the default Visual.
sentences.chinese: 当默认以8位视觉模式时，是否安装个人的调色板。

sentences.english: Starry starry night , Paint your palette blue and grey .
sentences.chinese: 星夜，你的调色板上只涂上了蓝与灰。

definition: see 五彩繽紛|五彩缤纷[wu3 cai3 bin1 fen1]
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
